hoeson4four: You shouldn't promote being fat, it's not healthy
brook_stein: Heart disease will get you soon enough
whitegirl_magic2: What are you going to do when diabetes takes your feet and you cant get your snacks ? They are going to have to cut a hole in the wall to haul your fat ass out on a flat bed truck
labellalaurita: i love this message! we are here to stay! ❤️❤️
tattoos_and_yoga: So this didn’t age well....? 🤷‍♀️ it’s March 22 and we’re about to be in the fight of our lives, but good thing we celebrated obesity while we could, right ? 🙈 People, wake up! Obesity is unhealthy and we’re seeing the consequences in real time. They’re already rationing ventilators and it’s just going to get worse. Covid patients with diabetes, hyper tension and cardiovascular issues are dying. Guess what contributes to these conditions? Obesity! Please recognize that your life is worth more than this. No, i don’t hate fat people. My mother is almost 400lbs and i am TERRIFIED for her because if she gets covid she is going to have a hell of a time. I’m saying it’s possible to love yourself AND take responsibility for your health. Please please please stay inside and take quarantine measures to try and protect yourselves.
leinonen71: I don’t think speaking bad will help. Everybody has the fulll right to live her life as she wants🧡Wonderful that you love you body but it is not healthy to have overweight. I think, or acually know, that a healthy lifestyle can make you love yourself as well. It is wonderful to be able to run, exercise, eat healthy and have a ”normal ” weight. Cut eating sugar and flour - and then enjoy life! I wish I had known this simple ”secret ” years back. Sugar and flour makes us overweight and depressed and gives us inflammations in the body. Love🙏🧡
callmedadawg: I literally fight and support a fat woman. Simply because I lost my virginity to one and I prefer to only date them. So I understand and appreciate, what they go through daily. Plus size women just want to be treated like everyone else human. Not told day to day, by none professional doctors. On how to eat, how to live, and educated on being fat.
marcysmeltdown: #worldobesityday ??????? Realllly . This is ridiculous dangerous and a disaster waiting to happen mostly because these people who look up to you aren’t all lucky enough to have perfect health, much like yourself. Having to sleep with a breathing machine is in no way the picture of health or comfortable. I always hear obese people talking about how comfortable they are in their skin.... but are they really ? Yourself and your community talk about diet culture being deadly for people but how is the message you’re sending any different . Heart disease if one of the leading causes of death for women among other things and obesity aggravates the condition so why would you even suggest or advertise being overweight ????
